text: Good morning. Has anyone experienced their website health scores dropping all at once for 404 pages that have popped up due to archives + archives blog side modules on a website. The website was fine, but then this 404 error randomly showed up and tanked their website health score all at once. It's weird because the 404 pages are not actually showing up as 404 pages when clicking the link to the page.

I've had this issue twice in the last month. Hundreds of pages returned 404 errors to crawl bots, but returned 200 status to users. It only lasted about 24 hours each time. It concerns me that if that keeps happening, Google will think those pages are gone and de-index those pages. I brought it up to HubSpot support the first time, then closed the ticket out the next day when it was over so nothing really came of it.
